website_summaries.verdict: The Skullcandy Crusher ANC headphones deliver seriously enhanced, adjustable bass levels with haptic feedback, but you can get stronger noise cancellation for the price.
pros: Powerful audio performance with adjustable bass depth and haptic vibration
Can be used passively with included audio cable
cons: Sound signature is far from accurate

customer_reviews.title: Terrible quality
customer_reviews.text: Dont be misled, sure these have the baddest base EVER!... however, the quality of the headphones thzemselves is terrible. The first time I used them, one of the buttons fell in, luckily I got insurance on them. After I went through sending them in for the warranty to be used to repair them, I was simply sent a gift card...? WOW. The worst part is I want another pair but I likely won't get a pair of skullcandy. It's been about 3 weeks that I should have been enjoying them, instead, I'm empty handed, SAD DAY!
customer_reviews.author: Leah padilla

customer_reviews.title: fun but ruined by hissing
customer_reviews.text: bass slider is fun to use and it's comfortable for several hours, has a hiss that wasn't present in previous models that could be distracting at lower volumes sadly. Noise cancelling is very disappointing compared to other headphones similarly priced.
customer_reviews.author: Jassim

customer_reviews.title: NO NEG REVIEW ALLOWED AT AMAZON
customer_reviews.text: AMAZON SENT USED HEADPHONES AND I PAID $266.50.. DISAPPOINTMENT WAS A BIRTHDAY GIFT. WIRES THROWN IN AND UNZIPPED CASE VERY SAD.
customer_reviews.author: Just saying

customer_reviews.title: INSANE BASS
customer_reviews.text: The bass on these is INSANE (as demonstrated in the video). By far the strongest and most clear bass you will find on the market. I have a pair of Crushers that are a few years old and I've worn it down a lot so I was in need of a new pair. I saw these new Crusher ANC's and was like why not give a shot since Skullcandy is a great brand and OMG these do not disappoint. Between the ANC and insane amount of Bass, the Crusher ANC's are most definitely worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as the original SkullCandy Crusher wireless
customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes for this headset especially after seeing all the reviews. The ANC isn't really that great and if nothing is playing there's an annoying hiss. Also unlike the original crusher wireless when bass hits on these headphones vibrate like crazy which honestly is quite annoying where the originals did not do that. on the pros though, these are much more comfortable on the crown of your head where the original crusher wireless would make the crown of your head hurt. Do I think it's worth it comparatively from it's cheaper older model? Jury is still out.
customer_reviews.author: jomiller97

customer_reviews.title: Unfixable Plastic Creaking
customer_reviews.text: I love how these sound, but there is this absolutely terrible PLASTIC CREAKING THAT WONT GO AWAY. Whenever I move just the slightest it is so loud and noticeable and sounds so cheap. I hate that I spent this much money on them only to get something that’s cheap and extremely plastic sounding. I can’t recommend as it’s something I have yet to find a solution for. If you remain perfectly still and don’t move at all. Then these will be ok for you.
customer_reviews.author: Harley B

customer_reviews.title: Wrong item!!! Lesser model received.
customer_reviews.text: I was looking at the skullcandy ANC headphones and saw the "used" option was around $200 rather than $350. There was more than one used listing for this price. When the product finally did arrive it IS NOT THE RIGHT MODEL!!! It says right on the earband "s6crw." ANC model number is "s6cpw-5448."It is the model without noise cancelling. Can get these new for $150. Not sure if it's a quality control issue or what but completely unacceptable. The only thing that is the ANC model is the box. I need this for my son who is on the spectrum (autistic.) I want the product I ordered for the price I paid.
customer_reviews.author: Matt s

customer_reviews.title: Skull candy customer service is terrible.
customer_reviews.text: Alright. I'm in love with skull candy, but these pair of headphones were faulty. Right speaker was blown, not near as good as the left side. YOU HAVE TO PAY TO SHIP THEM BACK, and receive a new pair from Warrenty. So instead of $320, it's going to be $360 for me. EXTREMELY DISSATISFIED SKULL CANDY
customer_reviews.author: Ethen Bowen

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Best dang headphones on the market. You will not be disappointed. I own the previous crushers and loved them too. If you love bass and want to feel it then these are the headphones for you. Plus you get personalized sound wich you can personalize to your own hearing. Then you get tile im case you lose them. You will be able to track them when someone turns them on. So many great things. Just try them for yourself you will love them.
customer_reviews.author: daniel

customer_reviews.title: Best I've Ever Owned
customer_reviews.text: I've tried Beats, JBL, Corwin E7 and I have top of the line systems in both my vehicles and home. I love quality sound. These headsets ae by far the best I've ever owned. From now on, I'm going with these. Skullcandy Crushers are the BEST, BEST, BEST, BEST, BEST, you will not be disappointed especially if you like quality deep pounding base.
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: Not bad, Not great.
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased quite a bit of Skull candy products in the past. They have decent sound for the price. This time I decided to pay a bit more and go with the higher end model. I am a little disappointed. Compared to the basic Skull Candy Crushers these are slightly better sound quality but I don't think they are worth the extra 150 bucks I paid. While these offer noise cancellation. They lack battery life compared to the regular crushers. They don't seem to go as loud either. Next time I will opt for the regular crushers.
customer_reviews.author: Camron

customer_reviews.title: Bass sensory stopped working
customer_reviews.text: It was good while it lasted. The bass sensory stopped working today. Called amazon and they were helpful but when trying to get a hold of Skullcandy be prepared to be on hold for more than an hour. I’m still on the phone with then as I’m writing this review. Product is awesome when it’s working. Customer support?....... not good at all.
customer_reviews.author: steve408

customer_reviews.title: They are so amazing!! Comfortable, sound great, noise cancelling is great!
customer_reviews.text: Best headphones I've ever heard! The sound is hands down as close to being front row center stage you can get without tickets!! I love everything about these headphones. I have no issues with the noise cancelling feature, they are super comfortable on my head and ears. I got the red ones and they are just beautiful. The sliding bass adjuster is super amazing since I like to have bass in my music, it rattles my head! Absolutely would buy again, would recommend to anyone who loves great sounding music. Will be getting my daughter a pair for her birthday if not sooner!
customer_reviews.author: Karma

customer_reviews.title: Watch out . Bad customer service
customer_reviews.text: How annoying to use expensive headphones only to malfunction . I’ve got my pair replaced and it started buzzing reached out to skull candy and they haven’t resolved my issue . Really can’t recommend these . Or company .
customer_reviews.author: Carlos tellez

customer_reviews.title: Bass heavy noise cancelling Bluetooth over ear headphones
customer_reviews.text: The fit is great. sound is much improved from the older model crushers. Battery life with the noise cancelling is more than 8 hours in my usage. And the connection speed once they're powered on is a lot faster as well. I went ahead and purchased a warranty this time around only because I do not trust the build given what happened to my older model crushers but we'll see what happens I guess. Over all of you're looking for bass heavy headphones then these are what you're looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Robert W.

customer_reviews.title: Sound quality isn't what I expected from Skullcandy.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these thinking it would be an upgrade from my hesh 2s. WRONG. These are very quiet even at max volume and the bass sound muddy and pops at every bass hit. Battery life is great and the noise canceling is good too. When the bass slider is on zero, then they sound like cheap headphones with no bass. Sorry skullcandy but I'm sticking with your old Hesh 2s because those are way better and the bass is more accurate.
customer_reviews.author: 2MARKO

customer_reviews.title: Bass MF, do you speak it?
customer_reviews.text: First I bought the regular skullcandy crusher headphones. They had way to much distortion and the bass wasn't that good. I had to send them back and spent the extra money to get these. Good lord, super quality highs and the bass is deep and rich. I grew up putting big subwoofers in all my vehicles. These are made for bass heads like us. Glad I paid the extra cash for these.
customer_reviews.author: king

customer_reviews.title: Learning Curve--Must Buy
customer_reviews.text: The headphones work as advertised, but there was a time I thought my headset was faulty. If the Bass and ANC stop working, then you need to turn it off for about 30 seconds and turn it back on. Moreover, if the issue still persist, then charge to full battery, then power on and off for 30 seconds. Beyond the small technical issues, the headphones are amazing. I am constantly adjusting the bass for every track, but when I have it up my head is thumping. Bass you can feel. Definitely worth the 299.99 I paid. Also, everyone keeps asking my about headphones. I didn't think they were this popular.
customer_reviews.author: Jason P

customer_reviews.title: WAY BETTER THAN EXPECTED!!!
customer_reviews.text: I got this headset just looking for some more bass to listen to music too but wasn't expecting to be MIND BLOWN on how good these actually are when used with other things too! Since the headset uses sensory bass, it takes watching movies and TV shows onto a whole new level of immersive! You can actually FEEL every explosion or dramatic music as if it were actually happening!! You'd have to get these to actually see how they are for yourself because explaining it just doesn't do it enough justice! HONESTLY this is one BAD ASS set of headphones!
customer_reviews.author: Ethan Breton

customer_reviews.title: NICE BUT I LIKE SKULLCANDY CRUSHER WIRELESS WITHOUT ANC MUCH BETTER. GREAT PRODUCTS.
customer_reviews.text: WHAT A HANDSOME WORK OF SCULPTED ART. ESPECIALLY IN RED! NICE PRODUCT BUT I PREFER CRUSHER WIRELESS WITHOUT ANC BETTER. NEVER THE LESS GREAT PRODUCTS. HIGH QUALITY. A LOT OF SOUND VALUE WITH ANY SKULLCANDY PRODUCT. THEIR EAR DRIVERS AND AWESOME SOUND DELIVERY RIVAL MANY OTHERS AND THEY ALSO HAVE GREAT PRICING AND CONSTANT DISCOUNT DEALS ON AMAZON PRIME AND THAT ALWAYS SWEETENS THE DEAL!
customer_reviews.author: MARK P.

customer_reviews.title: It's not what I expected for $345.50
customer_reviews.text: I have a Samsung Galaxy s6 edge plus it does not pair with my Bluetooth I have to use the auxiliary cord and the volume up button does not work nor does the volume down button I really want my money back but I still enjoy the base and the color
customer_reviews.author: Genesis Bouldwin

customer_reviews.title: Needs more volume but I'm sure its better than most out there these days
customer_reviews.text: Look awesome concept, you feel the bass on your head as for volume it falls WAY short, but if your trying to protect your ears for the long haul of life, make it 5 stars, if your older and already going deaf like me and a old school basshead not nearly enough volume to get the job done and totally wish someone would have put a review in like this for me to read before purchasing
customer_reviews.author: michael puckett

customer_reviews.title: SO WORTH IT...
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is amazing, most especially if the personalized sound is on. Coming from the skullcandy crusher wireless, this Crusher ANC is definitely an upgrade. The base blends well with the mids and highs, no matter how high the base goes. This ANC headphone is a lot lighter than the Crusher Wireless and more comfortable to use. Love that it swivels, and more flexible adjustment. As for the noise cancellation, it doesn’t cancel all the noise but cancels enough. No regrets purchasing this Crusher ANC. Awesome headphones! Save up and buy one.👍
customer_reviews.author: epicgen

customer_reviews.title: And boom goes the dynamite.
customer_reviews.text: I read every review I could find of this one....and the competition. Like, all the competition. And in the end, it was sound quality and call quality that edged out the rest. And I'm really glad I chose the Skullcandy cans. That bass is killer, and they fit great, and the battery just lasts. HIGHLY RECOMMENDED!
customer_reviews.author: Tim S.

customer_reviews.title: Best Headphones I've ever had..including my bose
customer_reviews.text: These are the most amazing headphones I've ever listened to. I have a few sets of various Bose headphones including noise canceling and none of them compare to the Skullcandy Crusher. The base is out of this world! Feels like you are part of the music.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Averett

customer_reviews.title: Dope bass, nice cancellation
customer_reviews.text: Power button is wearing out I can't press it anymore. I bought mine used and kind of regret it now. Still a great product!
customer_reviews.author: JayBen

customer_reviews.title: Build Quality is good way better
customer_reviews.text: It was confusing at first after upgrading from the crusher wireless to the anc bc i thought u had to hold the play pause button to turn on but no it was that lil button w the 4 led lights next to it to turn on but other than that THEY ARE AMAZING I WOULD RECOMMEND THESE FOR ANYONE TO BUY! Bass 10/10 sound and everything 10/10
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Tatro

customer_reviews.title: Buy only if you want to smile
customer_reviews.text: Seriously! Everyone I let wear these things smiles from ear to ear. I love the adjustable bass slider. Noise cancelling is not Bose or Sony's latest but the sound quickly drowns out any other noises the ANC misses. Crisp highs. Full mids. And of course thunderous bass which is adjustable to taste and genre. I listen to everything from classical to hip hop. If you like a mixer of music, these are the cans you are looking for.
customer_reviews.author: K. Carden

customer_reviews.title: Worth the 200 I spent
customer_reviews.text: I bought mine for 200 used. they are basically brand new however the noise-canceling turns on and off randomly. I wouldn't pay more for these. However, I would never go with another headphone. The haptic driver that these crushers have is something every headphone should have.
customer_reviews.author: DasMalkavian

customer_reviews.title: Received the headphones new.
customer_reviews.text: These must have been defective none of the lights worked the bass control did nothing, no change to the music at all. My in ear wired headphones that came with my SAMSUNG S9+ sound better, very disappointed. so at 250$ I'm afraid to try a replacement I'm not sure the quality is there.
customer_reviews.author: RANDY SPAULDING

customer_reviews.title: My husbands new love
customer_reviews.text: Husband loves them, he lost his last pair of skull crushers so its awesome these have a tracker. Pretty color, actually made me want a pair myself.
customer_reviews.author: Jade

customer_reviews.title: Best pair of headphones i've had.
customer_reviews.text: Beat headphones i have ever had. Bass is insane, great battery life and quick charging 10 min charge=3 hours, and the noise cancellation works so well it makes you're voice sound muffles. AMAZING
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Teenager approved
customer_reviews.text: The teenage audiophile is sold. And when I say audiophile I mean it. He's in college for sound engineering. Replaced his previous crushers and worth the money for the ANC. He paid for them he's THAT happy.
customer_reviews.author: Grace A.

customer_reviews.title: Broke after short period of use
customer_reviews.text: Only has it for a month and the power button fell into the headphone
customer_reviews.author: Amanda B.

customer_reviews.title: best bang for your buck
customer_reviews.text: Best bass headphones ever bought. Definitely worth the money and are great at noise canceling. Love these headphones. Fit perfectly over the ears and the sound is awesome!
customer_reviews.author: UndeRSmated1

customer_reviews.title: Think twice before buying.
customer_reviews.text: They don’t work and my son only had them less then a month.
customer_reviews.author: Annette Artura

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sound, not great noise cancelation
customer_reviews.text: Best sound other than my nuraphones & nothing beats the nuraphone noise canceling but the Skullcandy ANC Crusher is way more comfortable to wear. I love Skullcandy products had my first Crushers back in '06. I consider myself somewhat of an audiophile and I'd take these over Beats any day of the week.
customer_reviews.author: Poopie

customer_reviews.title: Get Crusher EVO instead
customer_reviews.text: I would say they are the best headphones but they are now in 2nd place. I would highly recommend the EVO crushers instead. They are so much better.
customer_reviews.author: TechPimp

customer_reviews.title: Crisp sound
customer_reviews.text: Loving it so far the only thingni can say is that it is not compatible with ps4 via bluetooth but you can use the wired connection on it. One thing ive learn from have skullcandy products is that they are delicate so ill def take very well care of this one.
customer_reviews.author: Marti

customer_reviews.title: Great Headphones but they've been prone to malfunction
customer_reviews.text: Needed some new headphones and decided to buy these. They are absolutely rad headphones, but after about a month and a half the Bass Slider stopped working and I began to notice a static/screeching noise when turning Noise cancelling on and off. Luckily Skullcandy gives you a 2 year warranty, i'm about to send mine back for a new set. When they work they are amazing headphones, but it is annoying that things have started malfunctioning after only a month.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos

customer_reviews.title: INSANE for gaming (in a good way)
customer_reviews.text: Honestly scares me thinking about how good these are. Music is sooo good with these. Maybe turn down bass for rock and metal cause the low frequencies often get lost, and its not the headphones for that, it's just how the song was mixed and mastered. But playing games on my laptop with them... is the best part xp these are very very good gaming headphones
customer_reviews.author: Brock Rogers

customer_reviews.title: The bass is crazy!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these headphones. The price point is high enough that I'm scared to use these at an active level so I can't review how good they are for an active life style but for just chilling and listening to music or watching movies or playing games they are amazing! The bass is so intense that sometimes they literally put me to sleep lol
customer_reviews.author: Justin_hammer

customer_reviews.title: Good for, video games, VR, Rap, and EDM music
customer_reviews.text: Fun for playing VR or other vedio games but the bass effect gets a bit much for extended listening. The noise cancelling is alright but there is a low active hissing noise and that's what did it in for me, I'm going all the way for the top with the Sony M4 next so hopefully it meets expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Eman

customer_reviews.title: Headphones
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these. He says its the best headphones he has purchase so far. Sound quality great. Noise canceling great!
customer_reviews.author: Renda

customer_reviews.title: If you want to FEEL the bass in all of your music choose these!
customer_reviews.text: These are honestly the best headphones I've ever owned and that's coming from someone who upgrades every couple of months. If you love bass these are absolutely the headphones for you. The sensory bass is an amazing feature.
customer_reviews.author: Pablo S.

customer_reviews.title: Boom. Best Headphones Ever!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome sound, nice carrying case came with purchase. Best pair of headphones I have ever used. Beautiful color too
customer_reviews.author: Maria Rakestraw

customer_reviews.title: The bass you can literally feel!
customer_reviews.text: Headphones are amazing. It’s literally bass you can feel like if you went to a concert and stood next to the speaker like god damn. Also they are super comfy and doesn’t get tiring to wear after so long. Loved being able to feel the bass on my favorite edm song or a Eminem classic. Keep it up Skullcandy these are the bomb! Also these are amazing for movies and gaming!🔥🎧
customer_reviews.author: Furious Cain

customer_reviews.title: Maybe I got a bad pair
customer_reviews.text: After 2 weeks the speakers sound like they are blown, lots of distortion everytime the bass hits.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Great product affordable price
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product as a kid I always followed the trend of how beats were the best because that’s what everyone said but after giving there a try I wouldn’t trade them for any other pair of headphones
customer_reviews.author: Angelo

customer_reviews.title: Bluetooth with a PC is complete garbage
customer_reviews.text: I've updated every driver, used different bluetooth adapters, isolated any possible interference.. still wont work.
customer_reviews.author: Darker Crimson

customer_reviews.title: Power button jam
customer_reviews.text: Power button is not easy to use and got jammed in. Perhaps this is a defective unit. If someone from Skullcandy can help make this right, I'd appreciate it. Owned for less than a month and will try customer service as well
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Get 'em
customer_reviews.text: These are better than the crusher wireless. Definitely an upgrade. Glad I did it. Hate it was listed $50 off after I bought it though.
customer_reviews.author: Angela D

customer_reviews.title: Great headphone
customer_reviews.text: It’s a great headphone for who like heavy bass sound !!! So happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Worth it, best headphones ever.
customer_reviews.text: When I say these headphones are worth it, I mean it. I just got my mine today and I used the haptic bass, it just threw me into the music. I listen to metal and every beat just hits exactly with the bass and it just makes the experience a mini concert. 100000/10 I recommend, get them and you seriously won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Saul

customer_reviews.title: They were amazing
customer_reviews.text: The bass was so powerful .. I sometimes couldn't handle the full bass on some songs. I returned in the end because of the price & comfort for long periods of time.
customer_reviews.author: DRP

customer_reviews.title: The best headphones. While they lasted
customer_reviews.text: They were they dopest headphones i ever heard.. they have this extra bass that really immerses you into it. i really, really, really loved these headphones until the bass gave out kn me in less then a month. its a shame and now im not sure if I should take another chance at trying them out again.
customer_reviews.author: Roberto roig

customer_reviews.title: Don't expect them to be any different just because of the noise cancelling.
customer_reviews.text: Im happy with them, just maybe had a little too much expectations of it being the best in the world but they're alright, just not insanely amazing. Not much difference from the original ones that in my opinion are more comfortable and are way cheaper and the cheaper ones have a way longer battery life, so if my ANC's break i bet id just buy the original cheaper ones instead
customer_reviews.author: Bruno John Roy

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: This was a present for my grandson, he absolutely loves them
customer_reviews.author: Douglas J. Mccormick

customer_reviews.title: Connectivity to my phone and noise cancellation
customer_reviews.text: I didn't like it because there was no sound cancellation whatsoever especially when you're riding on the scooter you can still hear the wind blowing in the years it was horrible but other than that the the sound was awesome when it comes down to base but other than that Wi-Fi connection was the problem with my phone
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Megowan

customer_reviews.title: BEST FRIEND EVER
customer_reviews.text: I am a indefectible techno and bass girl and those heaphones are out of this world for me! The sound is incredible. However, personally, after a while the vibration start to ache a little bit because I have sensitive ears. But Bloody Hell that is literally the BEST gift I made to myself. The price is high but so totally worth it! Amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Sibylle Ragueneau

customer_reviews.title: the companion app is terrible but not necessary
customer_reviews.text: These headphones have great bass that tickles my ears and rattles my head but the skull candy app is terrible and I had Bluetooth connection issues on my galaxy s8+ but when I changed to the Galaxy s20 it works significantly better but the app is still bad
customer_reviews.author: chad

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than the previous one
customer_reviews.text: Somehow I am a bit disappointed. I was a expecting a better version of the previous one but it does not feel like one.
customer_reviews.author: Julio César Rodríguez La Torre

customer_reviews.title: Bass/sound is worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the headphones! Also the seller Would recommend. Anc and ambient setting work great!
customer_reviews.author: juan coronado

customer_reviews.title: Watch out ..... ugh...
customer_reviews.text: Power button fell into headphone when i touched it to turn off. For 328 dollars and change. I fell robbed not to mention they have a 30% sale not even a month after purchasing. I complained to the company with no response.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: These things ROCK!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love the headphones! The only issue that I have with them is for the price they could have made them with similar materials as the Crushed 360 with the aluminium arms on the earcups etc.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bass Stopped Working
customer_reviews.text: They worked great for about a week, and then the bass stopped working. I tried resetting them and the problem persists. I’ve submitted a warranty claim with Skull Candy and have heard NOTHING!
customer_reviews.author: David DeVault

customer_reviews.title: My best headphones ever!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome!! Loud!!! Heavy Bass!!! Just found out you can charge these while you using them! 😋☺️
customer_reviews.author: Dominic Shaw

customer_reviews.title: Not bad, Then bad.
customer_reviews.text: Overall it's a good product if you like bass, feels gotty but comfortable. Don't workout in them always feels loose then falls off. The sound quality is good, not great.
customer_reviews.author: randy

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones
customer_reviews.text: So, I bought my first pair of anc crushers and had to return them within my first week of having them. When I plugged them in the headphones would hiss and pop, and then not hold a charge. This second pair is fantastic! I highly recommend them if you listen to heavy bass music, not a beginner pair of headphones
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Headphone
customer_reviews.text: We have 3 pairs in our family and love them!
customer_reviews.author: Thea Roy

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Bass
customer_reviews.text: If it didn't arrive broken I would keep it. It sounds amazing and good for gaming or anything. Noise cancelation is good but I don't recommend them if you sweat alot because It soaks in the sweat
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Bass Masters!
customer_reviews.text: The bass is sooooo great, it vibrates my head. I had beats before and they were great, too...good base, but you couldn't adjust them. My new crushers let me adjust the bass, more for this song, less for that one. AWESOME!
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Almost good
customer_reviews.text: The noise cancellation isn't as strong as the Sony, and the ear buds is quite small to me. The sound quality is top-notch however.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Alvin Diaz

customer_reviews.title: Sounds great
customer_reviews.text: What i like:..Sounds amazing no doubt about it..great quality ... What I don’t like:.is for the price I still think needs more volume compare to other brands and the app i think is waste of time doesn’t help that much ...thank you
customer_reviews.author: Jesus

customer_reviews.title: For 220$
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't ask for more. Bass is amazing typically charge once a week and for 220 it's a steal, at least that's how much it was when I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Faith Lewis

customer_reviews.title: What did you say?
customer_reviews.text: Turned the bass up, headphones sounded and felt amazing. I have the shakes and can't hear people talking anymore but I'd buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Fengo

customer_reviews.title: Best
customer_reviews.text: I have Bose, Sony, and Dre Beats... these are by far better then any of those
customer_reviews.author: antwon l williams

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: This is what my son asked for Christmas as his main gift. I can really say I am very impressed by the noise quality and cancellation. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Nichole Garner

customer_reviews.title: truly unique experience
customer_reviews.text: When I put these on i genuinely smile from how unique the experience is. Noise canceling can be better, but takes out most background noises...
customer_reviews.author: Ruan

customer_reviews.title: Best choice so far
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are everything for bass lovers, and are a great choice even if your not a fan of the bass because of the built in tracker, anc and high battery life
customer_reviews.author: Jacob

customer_reviews.title: Amazing headphone
customer_reviews.text: Overall the headphones themselves are very good. But the battery life is awful it’s like every 30 minutes I’m getting an low battery alert. Like 4 hours 10 min charge is not that promising.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas jones

customer_reviews.title: Bass is out of this world
customer_reviews.text: I just got them and the sound quality is amazing the bass literally shakes your brain definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: leslie

customer_reviews.title: Most incredible headphones
customer_reviews.text: Every song sounds like I'm literally at a concert. The bass is absolutely amazing. Totally worth the money I spent!

customer_reviews.title: buy something else
customer_reviews.text: Bad quality bad anc rotating earcups annoying as hell get something else too expensive for what it is

customer_reviews.title: Good anc headset
customer_reviews.text: Pretty decent anc and nice bass that doesn’t Distort the mids and highs
customer_reviews.author: Isabel

customer_reviews.title: Solid product
customer_reviews.text: I disliked the slight volume decrease when noise canceling was on and the background his when it’s on without music playing with the anc on
customer_reviews.author: Aidan kirkpatrick

customer_reviews.title: Good but fragile
customer_reviews.text: Very good sound but after one small drop they broke so their a little fragile but other than that there great headphones
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend this product
customer_reviews.text: If you're a heavy bass lover then here we go. And the beauty is that you can adjust your bass
customer_reviews.author: Yiga Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones!
customer_reviews.text: I love these headphones. Great sound, great noise cancelling! The crusher system is amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Rios

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product, you can actually feel the bass in the music.
customer_reviews.author: Chad D.

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: So far they're working great. Been using skullcandy headphones for like 14 years and the sound quality is always great for the price. These are no exception but I still waiting to see if they break. Build quality seems pretty solid so I'm not super worried about that. The active noise cancelling isn't as good as what you'd get from sony but these are considerably cheaper than the sony equivalent so it's to be expected. I'd say these are well worth the money if you're after a solid high end pair of headphones in this price range.
customer_reviews.author: Cinnaminion

customer_reviews.title: Skullcandy Crusher ANC
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are brilliant, I had the original Skullcandy crushers (which we’re also great) for a few years but bought these as they have the noise cancelling feature. I work as a gardener and with the noise cancelling on these headphones really cut down the sound of my lawnmower, they are comfortable to wear for long periods of time and the sound quality is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: menacedude

customer_reviews.title: Very good, but not quite there.
customer_reviews.text: Good product, but the haptic feedback feria disconnected from the tracks compared to Nuraphones that I own. Strong sound but slightly off the mark, there is certainly a hiss with the ANC on and nothing playing
customer_reviews.author: Kartel

customer_reviews.title: There is a loud hiss with anc off.
customer_reviews.text: There is a loud hiss with anc off. Everything else is great but when you tell skullcandy about the hiss they deny all knowlage and tell you to turn anc off even if you state anc is off.
customer_reviews.author: Vladimir Putin

customer_reviews.title: Excellent heartphone!
customer_reviews.text: This heartphone is amaizing strong bass very comfort for long lising any muzic .Sound clear and nice am recommend buy this heartphone. Thanks for excellent product!
customer_reviews.author: Uldis Marusens

customer_reviews.title: 200 £ for 3 months life
customer_reviews.text: My girlfriend bought me this headphones for Christmas . The sound of this headphones is ok, i didn't see any big difference with one of the previous model, and also they broke up since a month, the power up botton is keeping going inside the headphones, i had to take them apart too many bloody time today was my 8 time that i opened them to push the botton back outside and now is not even working anymore. I can't take it anymore i'm very disappointed, they are way too e pensi e and very low qualità.
customer_reviews.author: Ilario Stefanachi

customer_reviews.title: It sounds greeeaaaatttt!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Besides the fit of the earcups which in my opinion isn't as comfortable as the skull crusher but besides that..omg..buy!! Buy!! Buy!!
customer_reviews.author: Don

product_meta.title: Skullcandy Crusher ANC Bluetooth Wireless Over-Ear Headphones, Noise Cancellation, Adjustable Bass, and Personalised Sound, Up to 24 Hours Battery Life - Moab Red
feature_bullets: Adjustable Sensory Bass: This is literally bass you can feel. We call it Sensory Bass, meaning your headphones deliver a unique vibration every time the bass hits. Move the slider up for more feeling or down for less.

Personal Sound: The Skullcandy App analyzes your hearing and perfectly tunes Crusher ANC to your unique sound profile, allowing you to hear parts of your music you didn’t know you were missing and to hear the parts you love even more vividly. It’s like hearing your music for the first time.
Skullcandy App: The Skullcandy App makes Personal Sound with Crusher ANC possible. Easily pair your headphones to the app to set up your Personal Sound profile.

Active Noise Cancellation: Ideal for blocking out city noise and plane engines. The technology actively monitors your environment tofilter out external noise, making your audio sound extremely crisp and clean. Want to hear what's going on around you? If you're in the city or another crowded space, just touch the left ear cup for 5 seconds and your headphones will go from Active Noise Cancelling mode to Ambient Mode.
Tile: You don't have to worry about osting your Crusher ANC thanks to the built-in Tile tracker. Check the Tile app at anytime to pinpoint the location of your headphones.
